NeckLVNeckFlx.name: Lever Neck Flexion
NeckLVNeckFlx.preparation: Sit on seat in machine. Position padded lever on face. Position body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support.
NeckLVNeckFlx.execution: Move head forward by flexing neck until chin touches upper chest. Return head by hyperextending neck and repeat.
NeckLVNeckFlx.stabilizers: latissimusdorsi, tricepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, trapeziuslower, rectusabdominis, rhomboids, obliques

NeckLVNeckLtrFlx.name: Lever Lateral Neck Flexion
NeckLVNeckLtrFlx.preparation: Sit on seat in machine with feet apart. Position side of head on padded lever. Center body so neck is in line with lever axis. Grasp handles for support.
NeckLVNeckLtrFlx.execution: Move head down to side by laterally flexing neck. Return head to opposite side and repeat. Sit in machine backwards and continue with opposite side.
NeckLVNeckLtrFlx.comments: See all muscle used in Lateral Flexion Atlantoccipical  AntlantoaxialCervical SpineThoracic  Lumbar Spine Thoracic  Lumbar Spine movement is typical involvedin this exercise. See animation of spinal lateral flexion.
NeckLVNeckLtrFlx.synergists: trapeziusupper, splenius, levatorscapulae, iliopsoas, quadratuslumborum, erectorspinae, obliques
